briefTitle: Liraglutide in the Treatment of Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Mean Weekly Glucose Concentrations
outcomeMeasures.description: The primary endpoint of the study is to detect a difference from baseline in mean weekly blood glucose concentrations before and after 12 weeks of treatment in each of the Liraglutide groups.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in HbA1c
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline (week 0) in HbA1c at 12 weeks after treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Body Weight From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in Body weight in Kg from baseline after 12 weeks of treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Total Insulin Dose From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Total daily insulin dose = Basal insulin dose plus bolus insulin dose. Change from baseline in Total daily insulin dose at 12 weeks from treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in the Area Under Curve (AUC) of Glucose Following the Meal
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in the Area Under Curve (AUC0h-5h) of glucose concentration measured following meal challenge of up to 5hrs performed at baseline (week 0) at 12 weeks following treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Carbohydrate Intake
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline (0 week) in Daily Carbohydrate intake (in grams) at 12 weeks after treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Glucagon Concentrations
outcomeMeasures.description: change from baseline (week 0) in glucagon concentrations following 12 weeks of treatment
